transArray.content: First of all, the service is very friendly and the room is very clean. The location is not only very close to the business trip, but also very close to the subway and bus. It is very convenient to go out and play. It is not bad and feels good.

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. As you said, the hotel is located in the Badili Automobile Park on the West 4th Ring Road, only a five-minute walk from Haidian 5th Road Ju Station on Metro Line 6. , the surrounding transportation network extends in all directions. It's great to see the positive endorsement from you. When you check in next time, if you have any questions about the room, you can contact our front desk partners at any time. We are at your side 24 hours a day. We look forward to your visit again and wish you a happy life!
